headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of Northrop Grumman Corporation - NOC
summary: NEW YORK, May 12, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of  Northrop Grumman Corporation . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at...

headline: Defense Contractors Stocks Q1 Results: Benchmarking Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT)
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Lockheed Martin (NYSE:LMT) and the best and worst performers in the defense contractors industry.
